attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP
attributes.review: this app is so disorganized and super buggy. i downloaded it and it wouldn’t let me open it. i just wanted to see my sexy president but it wouldn’t let me :( so sad, very sad, i wanna cry.

attributes.title: A joke
attributes.review:
Just like bunker boy’s presidency 🤡 Oh yea and he’s also trying to get rid of TikTok cuz he can’t handle the criticism of children 🤡
It’s great that our president has confidence 🧚‍♀️🌸🌟✨ but he shouldn’t 💗🌝🌸🧚‍♀️✨

attributes.title: Trump is racist
attributes.review: First off I despise trump I don’t like him this app is a description of tears and sadness like he finna van tiktok I don’t think so but us beautiful gen z people are fighting back so mr trump you going down

attributes.title: the worst app ever
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support our lovely 🍊and for the first couple of days it was great but then things like the trump administration deciding to ban tik tok and i realized that we had hurt that gen z had hurt the 🍊feelings and he’s taking our app away so i would like to take his horrible app who kept glitching out and not working

attributes.title: SPAM
attributes.review: I’ve been receiving notifications filled with inaccurate statements and false claims. Take this app down immediately!

attributes.title: Very bad
attributes.review: I am a 93 year old racist and just wanted a place to support MY president. the app crashed multiple times and took forever to load. HORRIBLE.

attributes.title: Garbage
attributes.review: I downloaded the app and all of a sudden I was saying racist, homophobic, sexist things and my family allowed it.. garbage. Would not recommend.

attributes.title: This app is booty cheeks
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to support my president Matthew gray gubler but then I noticed that this app is about an orange irrelevant person. I am very disappointed.

attributes.title: Horrible app don’t download
attributes.review: This is one of the worst apps I have ever downloaded. It slow and not worth your type.
